work.title: Software Developer Intern
work.description: Remote internship focused on developing automation solutions and custom tools to streamline business processes and improve operational efficiency.
achievements: Designed and implemented a property matching script using Deluge scripting and Zoho CRM, automating deal generation and improving lead-to-property match accuracy by 15% and accelerating outreach

Developed and deployed a custom JavaScript sidebar widget in Zoho Desk, streamlining workflows and increasing ticket submissions by 40% by eliminating the need for team members to switch between CASA and CRM tabs
